definitions: with an ability to express oneself easily and articulately

examples.text: she speaks fluently and convincingly on the need for more controls

definitions: (with reference to speaking or reading a particular foreign language) with ease and accuracy

examples.text: children learned to read fluently by the end of the year
he can converse fluently in Filipino

shortDefinitions: (with reference to speaking or reading language) with ease and accuracy

definitions: in a smoothly graceful and effortless manner

examples.text: Moscow Flyer jumped fluently at Aintree to record a six-length victory
if they move their bow fluently throughout those 4 octaves, then they are good violinists

shortDefinitions: in smoothly graceful and effortless manner

definitions: in a way that progresses smoothly
